price: Alipo pelekewa jioni farasi wasimamao kidete, tayari kutoka shoti;
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ
footnotes: Na hebu taja katika khabari za Suleiman kuwa alipelekewa alasiri farasi wa asli ambao hutulia wanapo simama, na huenda mbio wanapo kwenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
